title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.10 - Disclosure required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.10 - Disclosure required

State Regulations

Every insurer, agent or broker selling insurance pursuant to a mass merchandising plan shall, prior to sale, make full and fair disclosure to prospective insureds of all features of such plan, whether favorable or unfavorable, including but not limited to premium rates, benefits, duration of coverage and policyholder services. 13.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
